statements.name: PROC OPTIONS
statements.description: Lists the current settings of SAS system options in the SAS log.

arguments.name: DEFINE
arguments.description: displays the short description of the option, the option group, and the option type.

arguments.name: EXPAND
arguments.description: Returns the value of the specified environment variable.

arguments.name: GROUP=
arguments.description: displays the options in one or more groups specified by group-name.

arguments.name: HEXVALUE
arguments.description: displays system option character values as hexadecimal values.

arguments.name: LISTINSERTAPPEND
arguments.description: lists the system options whose value can be modified by the INSERT and APPEND system options.

arguments.name: LISTGROUPS
arguments.description: lists the system option groups as well as a description of each group.

arguments.name: LISTOPTSAVE
arguments.description: lists the system options that can be saved with PROC OPTSAVE .

arguments.name: LISTRESTRICT
arguments.description: lists the system options that can be restricted by your site administrator.

arguments.name: LOGNUMBERFORMAT
arguments.description: includes or omits punctuation in the display of numeric system options values

arguments.name: LONG
arguments.description: lists each system option on a separate line with a description.

arguments.name: OPTION=
arguments.description: displays information about one or more system options.

arguments.name: option-name
arguments.description: specifies the option to use as input to the procedure.

arguments.name: NOEXPAND
arguments.description: Returns the path for the environment value.

arguments.name: NOLOGNUMBERFORMAT
arguments.description: omits punctuation in the display of numeric system options values

arguments.name: RESTRICT
arguments.description: displays system options that the site administrator has restricted from being updated.

arguments.name: SHORT
arguments.description: specifies to display a compressed listing of options without descriptions.

arguments.name: VALUE
arguments.description: displays the option's value and scope, as well as how the value was set.
